content.rendered:
Directed by Raghava Lawrence. Balakrishnan Thevar

Written by Farhad Samji. Raghava Lawrence. Sparsh Khetarpal. Tasha Bhambra

Cast Akshay Kumar (Asif / Laxmi). Kiara Advani (Rashmi). Sharad Kelkar (Laxmi). Ashwini Kalsekar (Ashwini). Ayesha Raza Mishra (Ratna (as Ayesha Raza)). Rajesh Sharma (Sachin). Manu Rishi Chadha (Deepak). Tarun Arora (MLA Girija). Prachi Shah (Girija’s Wife). Aryan Preet (Young Laxmii). Adhvik Mahajan (Angad). Mir Sarwar (Abdul Chacha). Muskaan Khubchandani (Palak). Vinita Joshi (Anjali (as Vinita J.)). Amika Shail (Angad’s Girlfriend). Gopal Verma (Chintu). Biju Antony (Pankaj). Bobby Aujla (Bobby).Sushma Bhagwat. Ranjit Deval (Announcer). Narendra Singh Dhami (Prem). Rajesh Dubey (Baba (as Rajesh Dubeay)).Elena Roxana Maria Fernandes. Jasper (Baba). Vijay Kaushik (Girija’s Baba). Saarvie Omana (Asif’s Sister (as Saarvi Omana Chand)). Ankur Rastogi (Advait). Arun Shekhar (Sarpanch). Chobber Sidhu (Golo). Abhinay Raj Singh (Mayur).Prashant Singh

Languages Hindi. English

Producers Himanshu Joshi. Tusshar Kapoor. Shabinaa Khan. Vicky Mishra. Nillay Pande. Umesh Pawar. Praful Salunke. Manan Sampat. Yogiraj Shetty. Anil v Singh. Ravinder Thakur

Production Cape of Good Film. Fox STAR Studio. Shabinaa Entertainment
